cells.data:
#### Substantive questions on the SO noise curve model/procedure to continue/way forward

Basic questions
* What is new about the noise curve model?
* What goes into creating that model?
* How does it deviate from the ideal noise curve? Why?
* Will it change again in the future? If yes, how do we expect it to change?

Science questions
* How does the new noise curve model change our forecasts?
*
